tasks.label: run-main
tasks.command: jflex -d ./src ./AnalizadorLexico.jflex; & java -jar ./lib/java-cup-11b.jar -destdir ./src -parser Parser -symbols sym -interface -expect 1 ./sintax.cup; & java -cp 'C:\Users\leona\Escritorio\Semantico\bin;c:\Users\leona\Escritorio\Semantico\lib\java-cup-11b-runtime.jar;c:\Users\leona\Escritorio\Semantico\lib\java-cup-11b.jar' App ./input.txt
